title: U.S. retaliates after deadly attack on Jordan base
description: The U.S. strike follows a drone attack, blamed on Iranian-backed militants, that killed three U.S. troops and injured dozens more at an outpost in Jordan.

title: Ukraine informs U.S. about decision to fire top general
description: White House officials did not endorse or object to the planned ouster of Gen. Valery Zaluzhny, saying it’s President Volodymyr Zelensky’s choice to make.

title: A 6-year-old in Gaza City was calling to be rescued. Did anyone find her?
description: Hind Hamada’s story is emblematic of the ongoing dangers faced by civilians in northern Gaza and the depth of their isolation from the outside world.

title: Man dies after falling from London’s Tate Modern gallery, police say
description: The London Metropolitan Police said that the man’s death was being treated as unexpected but is not thought to be suspicious.

title: Gas explosion in Kenyan capital injures hundreds, sparks huge fireball
description: At least three people were killed when a truck filled with canisters of cooking gas exploded in the heart of a densely populated Nairobi neighborhood.

title: Ukraine’s top general, awaiting dismissal order, urges futuristic overhaul
description: Gen. Valery Zaluzhny, who was told Monday that he is being fired, called for a technological upgrade of Ukraine’s military to withstand Russia’s larger force.

title: Middle East conflict live updates: U.N. agency renews funding plea for Palestinians’ ‘sheer survival’
description: The UNRWA asked donor nations to reverse their decisions to suspend aid over allegations that staff members participated in Hamas’s Oct. 7 attacks.

title: A Palestinian posted a message on Oct. 7. Then came the death threats.
description: Dalal Abu Amneh, a Palestinian neuroscientist and renowned folk singer, found her life turned upside down after a Facebook message posted on Oct. 7.

title: Hungary’s Orban folds before the E.U. and reminds all of his weakness
description: For all his antics, Hungary’s illiberal prime minister needs Europe more than Europe needs him.

title: Larry Taylor, gunship pilot in Vietnam who led daring rescue, dies at 81
description: The Cobra attack helicopter pilot received the Medal of Honor last year for the 1968 rescue of a four-member Army reconnaissance patrol.
